entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:27 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 2:13 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: N 32 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
